column1: Service Domain specification for Investment Portfolio Analysis

column2: Perform scheduled and ad-hoc performance analysis on a customer's investment portfolio. This can include different types of analysis and performance comparisons
A relationship manager requests an investment portfolio performance analysis prior to a regular client meeting
Assess and report on investment portfolio make-up, valuation and performance

Consolidate investment portfolio transaction details and comparative market activity reports. Select types of performance analysis and apply analyses to the period of transaction data. Develop portfolio performance comparisons and evaluations/justifications
